@notice Sets the stale price delay value.
 @param stalePriceDelay_ The new stale price delay to set.

params.baseAsset: the asset of which the price is to be quoted

returns._0: the ETH price of the asset

params.baseAsset: the asset of which the price is to be quoted

returns._0: the USD price of the asset

isAssetSupported(address).notice: Checks whether the asset is supported

params.baseAsset: the asset of which the price is to be quoted

returns._0: true if the asset is supported

setStalePriceDelay(uint256).notice: Sets the stale price delay value.

params.stalePriceDelay_: The new stale price delay to set.
